item.description:
It's time for a rematch let's see which team will get the highest score.........who will it be the red or blue team? We did this in February and had a lot of fun come out and join us for a afternoon of fun and LOT'S of laughter!

LaserCraze of North Andover, Massachusetts, is New England's newest and largest laser-tag entertainment and fun center.

Ready - Aim - High-Tech Action!
LaserCraze LASERTAG is fast-paced high-tech game, which combines the games of hide and seek, tag, and capture the flag, incorporating state-of-the-art interactive computer and laser technology to create an exhilarating experience you won't forget.

The game is played in a multi-level futuristic arena filled with glowing pillars, arches, passageways and swirling fog. Players, whether individually or on teams, use their lasers to score as many points as possible by targeting opponents' vest sensors or attempting to overtake the opponents' base stations.

Individual scores are tracked in real time and are displayed on each players vest and on monitors throughout the arena. The team with the highest total score wins.

Pricing:
Players One Session:
1 to 10ppl $12.00pp
11 or more $11.00pp

Two Sessions
1 to 10ppl $20.00pp
11 or more $19.00pp

So come on out and have some fun playing this high tech version of Tag.

Make sure you bring your sneakers with you to this event, you will need them as we are running around the arena.

Parking:
They have a very big parking lot.

Bad weather will cancel this event remember to check back to confirm that this is still on. If you are not able to find us get lost or running late remember to take the Meetup phone # with you it is: 978-304-2811.

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event. If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”.

Remember to change your RSVP if your plans change. Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the admission desk.
item.name: Laser Craze
